A father-of-three who posted an 'abhorrent' video on Facebook racially abusing three England players after the Euro 2020 final has been spared jail.

articles.author: John Nicholson
articles.title: Gareth Southgate has earned right to England squad acceptance - Football365
articles.description: Nobody should be questioning Gareth Southgate's England squad selections anymore; he is never anything but fair in his decisions.
articles.content: The first third of every season suffers from international coitus interruptus. Just when the league is getting started, it has to keep stopping every four weeks, for two weeks, for tournament qualifi… [+5201 chars]

articles.title: Salah, Mane, Pogba feature in scary-looking Prem XI of contract concerns... - Football365
articles.description: You could pick Liverpool's whole front three in this XI of PL players giving their clubs food for thought over their contracts. But we didn't. Still, it's a frightening front six...
